name: Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 Deluxe
overview: Hack of Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 Contains the following changes/updates/additions: - Sheeva finally playable (with Vs. Screen and finishers)! - 9 MK3 zones restored in the game (with Pit Fatalities)! - Animalities! [Only works on "one button finishers"] - Rain and Noob Saibot are now available for battle in the towers! - Rain has a Fatality! (commands same as MK Trilogy) - More characters run in Stryker’s Friendship - 3×3 mode! - Infinite time for the Kombat Zone. - Now the name “Friendship” is spoken twice, as in MK3! - Mortal Kombat Trilogy sound effects! - Menu codes in just one button! - Animation when the Round starts in “The Portal” - Shang Tsung now turns into Smoke! [Hold X, Left, Left, Forward, release X] - The Rooftop, The Street, The Subway and Bell Tower stages now have the screen completely filled (without the limitation of the “black bar” on the floor).
